Parameters.Name: SEARCH-7-1-1 GET MEDIA ATTRIBUTES – PTZ MEDIA ATTRIBUTES

Test.TestName: Features for profile G
Test.Name: Profile G is supported: receiver not supported
Test.Description:
DUT supports all mandatory for Profile G features. DUT supports Media service DUT do not support Receiver service
GetServices: supported Scope list contains onvif://www.onvif.org/Profile/G Discovery feature: supported Discovery/Types/dn:NetworkVideoTransmitter feature: supported MaxPullPoints="3" HttpDigest="true" Sarch service: supported PTZ position serach: supported Replay service: supported Reverse replay: not supported RecordingControl: supported Recording Options: supported Receiver: not supported Media: supported WS-Basic notification: supporetd NTP: Supported WS-Username token: supported MediaService: supported
!!! Before this test case make sure that DUT has dn:NetworkVideoTransmitter discovery type !!!

Test.TestName: GET MEDIA ATTRIBUTES – PTZ MEDIA ATTRIBUTES
Test.Name: GetMediaAttributes - CanContainPTZ='false"

Test.TestName: GET MEDIA ATTRIBUTES – PTZ MEDIA ATTRIBUTES
Test.Name: GetMediaAttributes. Incorrect response with Profile G supporting (Pan/Tilt)
Test.Description:
FAILED - if Profile G is claimed as suported PASSED with WARNING - if Profile G is not declared as supported
TT should verify that TrackAttributes.MetadataAttributes.PtzSpaces for the Track contains PanTilt Position Generic namespace.

Test.TestName: GET MEDIA ATTRIBUTES – PTZ MEDIA ATTRIBUTES
Test.Name: GetMediaAttributes. Incorrect response with Profile G supporting (Zoom)
Test.Description:
FAILED - if Profile G is claimed as suported PASSED with WARNING - if Profile G is not declared as supported
TT should verify that TrackAttributes.MetadataAttributes.PtzSpaces for the Track contains Zoom Position Generic namespace.

Test.Name: Wrong space (PanTilt)
